document_data.caption: A map of Moray showing Horst on the Shannyth River.
document_data.name: Horst
document_data.mainbody: '''Horst''' was a small village located on the island of [[Moray]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Horst was located in central Moray along the [[Shannyth River]] near the [[Breasal Marsh]]. The village was approximately {{SI|10|mi|k|long=yes}} due north of the foothills of the [[Orcskull Mountains]].
